days.title: Introduction to Print Statements
days.content: Welcome to Python! Today we'll learn about different ways to print text.

exercise.title: Your First Programs
exercise.description: Run these print statements to see different ways of outputting text in Python!

days.title: Input and Output
days.content: Learn how to get input from users and display it back to them.

exercise.title: Personal Info and Song Generator
exercise.description: Run these programs to collect user input and create personalized output!
exercise.starterCode:
#Day2

MyName = input("Name: ")
MyAge = input("Age: ")
print("Nice to meet you!")
print()
print("So, you are")
print(MyName)
print("and you are")
print(MyAge)
print("years old.")

#task2
print("=== Your Song Generator ===")
print("""You'll be asked a bunch of questions
then we'll make you up an amazing
song, totally copyright free ðŸ˜­""")
print()
person = input("Name a person famous for something good: ")
thing = input("Name a thing they did: ")
place = input("Name a place you like: ")
rhyme = input("Give me a verb that rhymes with your person's name: ")
print()
print("There was a person called", person)
print("Who did something cool like", thing, "at the wonderful", place, "where you'll find me", rhyme)
exercise.hint: Run the code and answer the questions when prompted!

test_cases.input:
John
25
Einstein
Theory of Relativity
Princeton
jump
test_cases.expected:
Nice to meet you!

So, you are
John
and you are
25
years old.
=== Your Song Generator ===
You'll be asked a bunch of questions
then we'll make you up an amazing
song, totally copyright free ðŸ˜­

There was a person called Einstein
Who did something cool like Theory of Relativity at the wonderful Princeton where you'll find me jump

days.title: More Input Practice
days.content: Practice getting input from users and creating stories.

exercise.title: Lunch Plans and Song Generator
exercise.description: Run these programs to create personalized messages!
exercise.starterCode:
#Day3

myName = input("What's your name? ")
myLunch = input("What are you having for lunch? ")
print(myName, "is going to be chowing down on", myLunch, "very soon!")

#task3
print("=== Your Song Generator ===")
print("""You'll be asked a bunch of questions
then we'll make you up an amazing
song, totally copyright free ðŸ˜­""")
print()
person = input("Name a person famous for something good: ")
thing = input("Name a thing they did: ")
place = input("Name a place you like: ")
rhyme = input("Give me a verb that rhymes with your person's name: ")
print()
print("There was a person called", person)
print("Who did something cool like", thing, "at the wonderful", place, "where you'll find me", rhyme)
exercise.hint: Run the code and answer the questions when prompted!

test_cases.input:
Sarah
Pizza
Tesla
Electric Cars
California
drive
test_cases.expected:
Sarah is going to be chowing down on Pizza very soon!
=== Your Song Generator ===
You'll be asked a bunch of questions
then we'll make you up an amazing
song, totally copyright free ðŸ˜­

There was a person called Tesla
Who did something cool like Electric Cars at the wonderful California where you'll find me drive

days.title: Adventure Simulator
days.content: Create an interactive adventure story using input and print.

exercise.title: YOUR ADVENTURE SIMULATOR
exercise.description: Run this program to create your own adventure story!
exercise.starterCode:
#Day4 Project Day

print("YOUR ADVENTURE SIMULATOR")

name = input("What is your name?:")
enemy = input("What is your enemy's name?:")
power = input("What is your super power?:")

print()

print("It was a cold winter day.", name, "were walking down the street when" , name," saw ", enemy ," standing in the middle of the road." , name , "was know, the" , enemy, "is planing the attack. So", name, "use" , name +"'s secret power;", power)
exercise.hint: Run the code and enter your adventure details!

test_cases.expected:
YOUR ADVENTURE SIMULATOR

It was a cold winter day. Hero were walking down the street when Hero saw Dragon standing in the middle of the road. Hero was know, the Dragon is planing the attack. So Hero use Hero's secret power; Fire Breath

days.title: If Statements
days.content: Learn about making decisions in your code using if statements.

exercise.title: Character Quiz
exercise.description: Run this program to find out which character you are!
exercise.hint: Run the code and answer the questions to find your character!

test_cases.expected:
Who are you??
Which character are you?
You are Celestia.
